column5: Some how I have managed to change my text colour to orange, I have found everything from text size to another million options but cannot find text colour anywhere.    Does anyone have an idea where t resies?  I figured it would be in the system menu but maybe I looked right at it and didnt see it.   HELP!!!!!    D

Got to the sonar page only (no split screen) and hit menu. That will give you a drop down and one of the choices will be pallet color. You can change the colors here and there are about a dozen combinations. The font size can be changed but not the style. Hit "pages" and on the main screen with Nothing but the screen pages showing hit menu and that will but you into the overlay options and you can move, change size of text and remove captions which will make it a smaller foot print still
Thanks man Ill give that a try. Man there are alot of options on this thing!
Orange means the system is going to fail very soon.......just send it to me and I'll send you some nice $.25 off coupons on some nice split shots....
Are you sure your not in night mode? Turn your unit on, hit power button and make sure your night mode icon is off.
Got it thanks guys!    Thats what it was, have no idea how I turned it on but its back to normal!    D
